title: Sharjah Ruler acts on public pleas, restores salary and approves Dh300,000 education aid
summary_full: His Highness Sheikh Dr Sultan bin Mohammed Al Qasimi's intervention on the "Direct Line" radio programme led to immediate government action on public cases. He addressed issues ranging from employee entitlements and educational funding to infrastructure development, demonstrating responsive governance and a commitment to citizen welfare.
